title: Which feature phone has coolest features? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nokia 105 has best features: Built on the same old Nokia platform giving huge battery backup. Excellent cellular network and cellular call quality. A torch And the  snake xenzia game

Hmm.. Let's do one thing. You buy a smartphone, then un install all the apps (social media) you don't want. Keep only the ones you like. I think that will be easier. As far as I know as of now, feature phones don't come with compass. Smart phones have better quality cameras than feature phones.
